metadata.name: Om-X Pages and Panels Knowledge Map
metadata.description: Structured map of Om-X pages, modules, and panel responsibilities.

pages.title: Om-X Browser
pages.purpose: Primary browser shell and webview host.
how_it_works: Owns sidebar navigation, tab stack, and window controls.
Creates and manages webview tabs through TabManager.
Opens Home feature tiles, translator/writer popups, screenshot tools, and context menus.
Bridges modules like bookmarks, downloads, electron apps, and side panel state.

pages.title: Settings
pages.purpose: Central configuration for browser behavior, security, appearance, and updates.
how_it_works: Uses sidebar .sys-nav-item routing to switch panel-* sections.
Loads dynamic modules for Search Matrix and Vault when their panels open.
Reads/writes settings through window.browserAPI.settings.
Exposes update checks, theme save, block list management, and VirusTotal controls.

pages.title: Omni Neural Hub
pages.purpose: AI-focused control center for translator, writer, animations, AI themes, and utility launchers.
how_it_works: Uses sidebar .sys-nav-item routing to switch panel-hub-* sections.
Mounts translator and writer modules on startup.
Initializes LLM cards, animation manager, and AI theme manager when tabs are opened.
Applies active translator/writer settings via global btn-save-all relay.

pages.purpose: Search engine profile editor and @keyword manager.
how_it_works: Shows active search engine cards and keyword inputs.
Opens engine profile modal for name/icon/url editing.
Allows default engine selection and profile deletion for non-core entries.
Persists updates through the main Save Settings button.

pages.purpose: Secure vault for AI credentials and master passkey management.
how_it_works: Starts in locked state and requires master key unlock.
Manages AI key records (provider/model/email/token).
Supports passkey rotation with validation.
Allows global lock action for all active vault sessions.

pages.purpose: Translator backend configuration (provider, key, model, default target language).
how_it_works: Selects provider/model and optional custom model id.
Verifies connectivity using AI ping request.
Stores translator config in app settings.
Feeds runtime translation flows in the main browser popup.

pages.purpose: Writer backend configuration and default writing mode control.
how_it_works: Selects provider/model and optional custom model id.
Verifies connectivity using AI ping request.
Stores writer config in app settings.
Provides mode presets: balanced, professional, creative.

pages.title: Om-X App
pages.purpose: Standalone site-app container window with custom context menu controls.
how_it_works: Reads app, title, and url from query parameters.
Shows right-click context actions for back, reload, minimize, maximize, devtools, and close.
Delegates actions to siteAppAPI bridge.

pages.title: New Tab
pages.purpose: Default new-tab landing page.
how_it_works: Loaded as the default HOME_URL for new tabs.
Used by sidebar Home behavior and search overlay flows.

pages.title: History
pages.purpose: Local browsing history viewer and manager.
how_it_works: Fetches history entries from browserAPI.history.get().
Groups entries by date and supports text search filter.
Supports item delete and full history clear.

pages.title: Omni To-Do Station
pages.purpose: Task list with manual and AI-assisted organization.
how_it_works: Adds and tracks tasks with completion state.
Clears completed items.
Uses AI organize action for task restructuring.

pages.title: Om-X Neuro-Arcade
pages.purpose: Built-in arcade launcher for browser games plus external Electron game entries.
how_it_works: Switches between menu and game viewports.
Hosts multiple built-in game engines (snake, tetris, pacman, etc.).
Exposes retry/start controls per game.
Includes launch hooks for standalone Electron games.

pages.title: Omni AI Chat
pages.purpose: Main AI conversation workspace with mode switching and attachments.
how_it_works: Maintains chat sessions and message rendering.
Supports abilities popup modes (core, quick/deep search, video, wiki, prompt enhance, attach).
Supports send/stop generation flow and model/provider settings.
Integrates with response database when messages are prefixed with @.

pages.title: Omni AI Settings
pages.purpose: Provider/model configuration, search keys, persona options, scraper sandbox, and TTS settings.
how_it_works: Manages provider cards, model options, and connection verification.
Configures SerpAPI/Google PSE and web search related parameters.
Provides Neural Scraper overlay for image/video discovery and export.
Supports Pocket-TTS and PDF station launch actions.

pages.title: Local AI Management
pages.purpose: Local runtime/engine provisioning and GPU usage monitoring.
how_it_works: Displays host CPU and GPU memory/load telemetry.
Installs local inference runtime/engine when missing.
Lists available presets and load states.
Provides global unload/eject action.

pages.title: Minecraft Server - Om-X
pages.purpose: Unified manager for AI player, Bedrock/Java servers, llama.cpp, Pocket-TTS, and live view.
how_it_works: Switches between panel-* sections for subsystem operations.
Provides start/stop and config controls for server runtimes.
Supports AI player connection and command operations.
Includes console logs and helper panels.

pages.title: Omni PDF Station
pages.purpose: PDF reading workspace with integrated AI assistant panel.
how_it_works: Renders PDF pages and navigation controls.
Supports zoom, thumbnail toggle, and area selection.
Provides AI panel for summarize/read/send actions.
Stores AI panel config from in-page config overlay.

pages.title: Security Defense
pages.purpose: Blocked-access interstitial shown for unsafe targets.
how_it_works: Displays threat reason context.
Provides safe return action and details view.

pages.title: Omni Canvas
pages.purpose: Canvas + chat workspace for model-driven creation and editing.
how_it_works: Combines editor area and AI command flow.
Provides model select/refresh controls.
Supports undo/redo and view mode toggles.

pages.title: Music Player - Om-X
pages.purpose: Music playback page with multiple player UI styles.
how_it_works: Controls playback state and progress.
Supports style variants (minimal/card/compact/retro).
Offers transport and shuffle controls.

system_settings.title: Security & Defense
system_settings.purpose: Firewall, antivirus, and VirusTotal control center.

system_settings.title: Search Matrix
system_settings.purpose: Mount point for Search Matrix module.

system_settings.title: Ad Shield
system_settings.purpose: Ad/tracker filtering and YouTube addon options.

system_settings.title: Architect Profile
system_settings.purpose: Creator profile, social links, and GitHub-synced project tiles.

system_settings.title: About Om-X
system_settings.purpose: Runtime versions and application build info.

neural_hub.title: LLM Chat Hub
neural_hub.purpose: Web-app launcher cards for ChatGPT/custom LLM services.

neural_hub.title: Loading Animations
neural_hub.purpose: Select and save loading animation profile.

neural_hub.title: Music Player
neural_hub.purpose: Enable player and choose visual design.

neural_hub.title: AI Themes
neural_hub.purpose: Select and persist response-card visual theme.

neural_hub.title: Panel Tools
neural_hub.purpose: Launch curated external tools (for example Photopea).

minecraft_manager.title: AI Player
minecraft_manager.purpose: AI agent connect, command send, and autonomy controls.

minecraft_manager.title: Bedrock Server
minecraft_manager.purpose: Bedrock server path setup and lifecycle control.

minecraft_manager.title: llama.cpp CLI
minecraft_manager.purpose: Command-line generation helper for llama.cpp execution.

minecraft_manager.title: Pocket TTS
minecraft_manager.purpose: Pocket-TTS service configuration and runtime controls.

minecraft_manager.title: Java Server
minecraft_manager.purpose: Java server folder setup, RAM config, and start/stop controls.

minecraft_manager.title: Help Panel
minecraft_manager.purpose: Operational help/instructions for the manager subsystems.

save_entry_points: System settings are persisted by btn-save-settings.
Neural Hub translator/writer settings are relayed by btn-save-all to hidden module save buttons.
AI settings page has its own save and verification pipeline.
